text: And the children of Israel saw that the liers in wait had seized Gabaa, and they stood in line of battle; and Benjamin began to smite down 20. 39 Or, slain ones, i. e. to smite and cause to fall.wounded ones among the men of Israel about thirty men; for they said, Surely they fall again before us, 20. 39 Gr. as the first battle was.as in the first battle.
